name: Gremlin
description: A cross between King Louis XIII and Mogwai (White Fire Alien OG and ’09 Cookies crossed with a secret strain), Gremlin is a hybrid strain that carries the sweet scent of cookie dough and earthy pine. Heavy-handed euphoria and physical relief melts through the body, dulling pain and insomnia while sharpening the appetite.
descriptionPlain: A cross between King Louis XIII and Mogwai (White Fire Alien OG and ’09 Cookies crossed with a secret strain), Gremlin is a hybrid strain that carries the sweet scent of cookie dough and earthy pine. Heavy-handed euphoria and physical relief melts through the body, dulling pain and insomnia while sharpening the appetite.

highlightedReviews.text: üå≤üç∞ Gremlin will take you by surprise, have you munching fries with heavy red eyes, and teleport you to sunrise. With hints of pine and a baked sweetness, this hybrid is a creeper that will deliver serious dose of relaxation throughout your entire body. If you can make it off the couch after a few bowls of this, you will surely be headed to the refrigerator. This is an awesome strain for the evening, as it will let you wind down and suddenly smack you with loads of physical relief. It is not overwhelming, but definitely feels like it's on the Indica side. Great for pain and stimulating the appetite!

üå≤üç∞ Gremlin will take you by surprise, have you munching fries with heavy red eyes, and teleport you to sunrise. With hints of pine and a baked sweetness, this hybrid is a creeper that will deliver serious dose of relaxation throughout your entire body. This is an awesome strain for the evening, as it will let you wind down and suddenly smack you with loads of physical relief. It is not overwhelming, but definitely feels like it's on the Indica side. Great for pain and stimulating the appetite!

articles.title: New Strains Alert: Gremlin, Purple Cotton Candy, Tree of Life, Qush, and More
articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
We just updated the Leafly strain database with some new strain varieties and we're curious to see which ones you've tried already. Wanna know where you can find them near you? Check the links below, and don't forget to leave a review if you're able to get your hands on it!
¬†
¬†¬†¬†1. Gremlin

A cross between King Louis XIII and Mogwai (White Fire Alien OG and ‚Äô09 Cookies crossed with a secret strain), Gremlin is a hybrid strain that carries the sweet scent of cookie dough and earthy pine. Heavy-handed euphoria and physical relief melts through the body, dulling pain and insomnia while sharpening the appetite.

Gremlin is currently available at Green Life Cannabis in Wenatchee, WA
¬†
¬†¬†¬†2. Purple Cotton Candy

Purple Cotton Candy by LivWell is a calming indica-dominant hybrid strain that crosses Granddaddy Purple and Cotton Candy Kush. Once inhaled, you will notice a cotton candy flavor in the back of your throat as well as hints of lavender and skunk.

Click here for a full list of locations currently carrying Purple Cotton Candy
¬†
¬† ¬†3. Tree of Life

Tree of Life is a unique hybrid cross between Trainwreck and Mendocino Purps, created by Oregon OMMP growers in the late 2000s. It‚Äôs known to provide calming euphoria and an uplifting boost of creativity. With a vigorous sativa-dominant growth pattern, Tree of Life produces fully ripened buds with a rich palate of creamy orange zest and lemon balm. An early flowerer, Tree of Life will finish its maturation cycle by the third week of September outdoors. When consumed, Tree of Life has a pleasant taste reminiscent of sandalwood incense.

Click here for a full list of locations currently carrying Tree of Life
¬†
¬†¬†¬†4. Limon

Created by LivWell, Limon is a sativa-dominant strain that blends Sour Diesel, Strawberry Diesel, and NYC Diesel. With notes of diesel and skunk in flavor, these bright green frosty buds will leave you with an uplifting and long-lasting cerebral buzz.

Click here for a full list of locations currently carrying Limon
¬†
¬†¬†¬†5. Good Medicine

The name says it all with this CBD rich strain. Bred by CBD specialist Bodhi, Good Medicine crosses a Green Crack and Tres Dawg hybrid with the high-CBD Harlequin sativa. Offering sweet flavors of mango and candy followed by a mellow and relaxing high, Good Medicine is great for solving medical needs without keeping you on the couch.

Click here for a full list of locations currently carrying Good Medicine
¬†
¬†¬†¬†6. Qush

Qush is a 70/30 indica-dominant cannabis strain from TGA Genetics, who combines Pre-98 Bubba Kush with Space Queen. Bred for potency as well as flavor, Qush‚Äôs resin-packed buds radiate with sweet aromas of grape, cherry, and hashy spice. This tranquilizing strain has a way of calming worries and upset stomachs, but keep in mind that Qush can have a sedating, cloudy effect on the mind so consider saving this one for evenings and lazy days.

Click here for a full list of locations currently carrying Qush
¬†
¬†¬†¬†7. Alien Inferno

Using a White Fire #6 and Alien OG hybrid and crossing it again with Diablo, LivWell created Alien Inferno. Rock solid buds slathered in trichomes and red pistils, Alien Inferno is a heavy-handed OG hybrid that can help relieve pain, boost creativity, and help you unwind. With the taste of earth, pine, and lemon, this potent indica-dominant hybrid will take care of even the most experienced connoisseur.

Click here for a full list of locations currently carrying Alien Inferno
¬†
Browse through our other new strains that were recently added to the Leafly Explorer, or check out last week's newest additions!
